rioko.events

Class AbstractEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Event
      • rioko.events.AbstractEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataChangeEvent

    public abstract class AbstractEvent
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Event
    Abstract Class implementing the basic and generic mechanism to handle different kind of customs events. It is specially usefull for events not registered in the API which is being used.
    Author:
    Antonio

      • addListener

        public static void addListener(AbstractListener listener)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Static method to register a listener to the system
        Parameters:
        listener - AbstractListener to register
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the listener has no event associated

      • removeListener

        public static boolean removeListener(AbstractListener listener)
        Static method to dispose a listener of the system.
        Parameters:
        listener - AbstractListener to dispose
        Returns:
        true if the listener was previously registered and false otherwise
